mapper.select: select order_no, order_date, c.client_code, c.client_name, e.emp_name, order_receiving from m_order m left outer join client c on m.client_code = c.client_code left outer join employees e on m.emp_num = e.emp_num order by order_no DESC

select d.pro_code, p.pro_name, d.order_num, i.standard, c.client_code, unit, m.comments from m_order m join m_order_detail d on m.order_no = d.order_no join product p on p.pro_code = d.pro_code join product_option i on p.pro_code = i.pro_code join client c on d.client_code = c.client_code where d.order_no = #{orderNo}

select p.pro_code, p.pro_name, o.cost, o.sell_price, o.standard, o.unit, c.client_code from product p left outer join product_option o on p.pro_code = o.pro_code left join client c on o.client_code = c.client_code where p.pro_group = 'j2'
